t: Fantastic Furniture - Wikipedia
s: February 24, 2025 - Fantastic Furniture is an Australian owned and operated furniture retailer. It is a subsidiary of Greenlit Brands. Fantastic Furniture started as a market stall at Sydney's Parklea Markets in 1989, by friends Paul Harding and Jonathan De Jong, selling outdoor furniture.
